basic_information.scholarship_name: Patti and Ruki Neuhold-Ravikumar Endowed Scholarship for the Arts and Design

description: This scholarship was established in 2016, by Ruki and Patti Neuhold-Ravikumar, to benefit an international student in the College of Fine Arts and Design. Eligibility International Undergraduate, or Graduate Student Sophomore, junior, senior, or graduate student Minimum 3.25 GPA Personal 1-1/2 to 2 page essay, describing the applicant's journey to becoming a student at UCO, his or her artistic discipline or design specialty and what he or she hopes to accomplish in their professional career Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript
